snippet.title: YIIK I.V trailer: Addressing ONISM MAN
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/459080/YIIK_A_Postmodern_RPG/

YIIK I.V is a free update for YIIK a Postmodern RPG. 

It includes a new battle system programmed from the ground up.
New dungeons and bosses. 
Reimagined cutscenes. 
Brand new characters and storylines. 
And many surprises. 

YIIK I.V is launching early 2024! 

The Allanson brothers have been hard at work putting the finishing touches on YIIK I.V The game is complete outside of the Japanese language option.

Right before the Christmas break they received the completed translation from DragonBaby, and will begin work on implementing it on January 2nd. 

Thank you for your patience! 

-AckkStudios
